title: Smoked trout, artichoke and Jersey Royal salad

For the dressing: salt and freshly ground black pepper
For the salad: ½ red onion, very finely sliced
4 griddled artichokes, stored in olive oil, drained

steps: For the dressing, mix together the lemon juice, olive oil, sherry vinegar and salt and freshly ground black pepper in a bowl until well combined.
For the salad, place all of the salad ingredients, except the cottage cheese, into a large bowl. Pour over the dressing and stir.
To serve, divide the salad between two serving plates and top with a spoonful of cottage cheese.
